citeinfo.origin: Lamont-Doherty Geological Observatory of Columbia University
citeinfo.title: Summary Reports Prepared by Principal Investigators for the Bering Sea - Gulf of Alaska Geological Studies Review Meeting

descript.abstract: Teleseismic data for the period 1965 - 1975 show six events in the St. George basin regions. A single short-period station has been in operations on St. Paul Island for the past two years. The most recent 1 months of data from this station show 4 - 8 events that could have occurred in the Pribilof - St. George basin region.
descript.purpose: Summary reports prepared by principal investigators for the Bering Sea - Gulf of Alaska Geological Studies Review Meeting
